parameters.name: CheckType
parameters.description:
The type of the check
>>1 full quantity, 2 incremental, 3 all

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: Data migration instance ID, which can be queried by calling the **describemigrationjobs** API.

parameters.name: JobName
parameters.description: The name of the data migration or synchronization job.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.
